_comment_GOOGLE_GEOLOCATION_API: If true, will connect to preconfigured wifi credentials and query Google Geolocation API
_comment_LORAWAN: If true, it will send the WLAN scan with the closest 5 networks via LoRaWAN.
_comment_GPS: If true, it will try to read a location from a UART GPS module.
_comment_SAVE_TO_SD: If true, it will save scans and locations to SD card, datalogger mode.
_comment_CYCLE_SLEEP_S: How long to sleep for between cycles, in s.
